mapper.select: select sm.perms from sys.sys_role sr left join sys.sys_role_menu srm on sr.id = srm.role_id left join sys.sys_menu sm on srm.menu_id = sm.id where sr.id = #{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and sm.perms is not null and sm.perms <> ''

SELECT sm.*, #{userId} as userId FROM `sys_user` su LEFT JOIN `sys_user_role` sur ON su.`id` = sur.`user_id` LEFT JOIN `sys_role` sr ON sur.`role_id` = sr.`id` LEFT JOIN `sys_role_menu` srm ON sr.`id` = srm.`role_id` LEFT JOIN `sys_menu` sm ON srm.`menu_id` = sm.id
su.id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND
(sm.parent_id IS NULL OR sm.parent_id = '') AND sm.system_id = #{systemId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND sm.id IS NOT NULL AND sm.enabled = 10
group by sm.id order by order_num,create_date

su.id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND
parent_id = #{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND sm.id IS NOT NULL AND sm.enabled = 10
group by sm.id ORDER BY order_num,create_date
